info.name: NWCA Production API - Complete
info.description: Complete API collection for Northwest Custom Apparel. Auto-generated from Express routes.

item.name: üõçÔ∏è Product Search
item.description: Find products, colors, sizes, and check inventory

request.description: Search products by style number or name. Returns autocomplete suggestions.
Get complete product information including description, features, and specs.
Get color swatches with hex codes for visual display.
Get all products from a specific brand.
Get all products in a category.
Get list of all available brands with logos. Returns brand name, logo URL, and sample product styles. Perfect for building brand showcase pages or brand filter menus.
Get list of all product categories.
Get list of all product subcategories.

url.raw:
{{baseUrl}}/api/featured-products?// Search query
      category=&// Filter by category (can be array)
      subcategory=&// Filter by subcategory (can be array)
      brand=&// Filter by brand (can be array)
      color=&// Filter by color (can be array)
      size=&// Filter by size (can be array)
      minPrice=&// Minimum price filter
      maxPrice=&// Maximum price filter
      status = 'Active'=&// Product status filter (default to Active)
      isTopSeller=&// Filter for top sellers only
      sort = 'name_asc'=&// Sort order (default to name ascending)
      page = 1=&// Page number (default: 1)
      limit = 24=&// Results per page (default: 24=&max: 100)
      includeFacets = false // Include aggregation counts=

request.description: üÜï Advanced product search with smart grouping by style, faceted filtering, and comprehensive product data. Groups multiple records by STYLE to eliminate duplicates and aggregates colors/sizes. Perfect for catalog search pages.
Get all available colors for a style. Used for color picker.
Check real-time inventory levels by size and color.
Get available sizes for specific style/color combination.
Get all cart sessions. Each session represents one customer's cart.
Create new cart session for a customer.
Get all cart items across all sessions.
Add product to cart. Requires ProductID and SessionID.
Get size breakdown for cart items (e.g., 10 Small, 15 Medium).

request.description: POST /api/files/upload Upload a file directly to Caspio Files API Expects multipart/form-data with a 'file' field
GET /api/files/:externalKey Retrieve a file from Caspio by its ExternalKey
GET /api/files/:externalKey/info Get file metadata without downloading the file
DELETE /api/files/:externalKey Delete a file from Caspio
POST /api/files/upload Upload a file directly to Caspio Files API Expects multipart/form-data with a 'file' field
GET /api/files/:externalKey Retrieve a file from Caspio by its ExternalKey
GET /api/files/:externalKey/info Get file metadata without downloading the file
DELETE /api/files/:externalKey Delete a file from Caspio
POST /api/quote-items-with-file Create a quote item with optional file upload If ImageUpload field contains base64 data, uploads file first
Optimized endpoint that combines product, pricing, and DTG data in a single request
GET /api/health - Health check endpoint with comprehensive info

GET /api/manageorders/customers  Fetches unique customers from ManageOrders based on orders from the last 60 days.  Query Parameters: - refresh (boolean): Force refresh of cached data (default: false)  Response: { "customers": [...], "cached": true/false, "cacheDate": "2025-10-26", "count": 383 }
GET /api/manageorders/cache-info  Returns information about the current cache state (for debugging).

item.name: üìä ManageOrders API
item.description: ShopWorks ManageOrders integration - Customer data from OnSite ERP

request.description:
**Direct ManageOrders API Call** - Authenticate and get JWT token

This is a direct call to the ManageOrders API (not proxied). Use this to get a token for testing.

**Request:**
```json
{
  "username": "your-email@example.com",
  "password": "your-password"
}
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "id_token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...",
  "expires_in": 3600
}
```

**Note:** Our proxy handles authentication automatically - you don't need to call this for normal usage.

**Get Unique Customers from Last 60 Days of Orders**

Fetches and deduplicates customers based on orders placed in the last 60 days.

**Features:**
- ‚úÖ Automatic deduplication by customer ID
- ‚úÖ Phone number cleaning (removes 'W ' and 'C ' prefixes)
- ‚úÖ Sorted alphabetically by customer name
- ‚úÖ 24-hour cache (configurable)
- ‚úÖ Rate limited (10 requests/minute)

**Query Parameters:**
- `refresh` (boolean, optional): Force cache refresh. Default: false

**Response:**
```json
{
  "customers": [
    {
      "id_Customer": 12279,
      "CustomerName": "Washington State Housing Finance Commission",
      "ContactFirstName": "Tera",
      "ContactLastName": "Ahlborn",
      "ContactEmail": "Tera.Ahlborn@wshfc.org",
      "ContactPhone": "206-287-4470",
      "ContactDepartment": "Marketing",
      "CustomerServiceRep": "Nika Lao",
      "lastOrderDate": "2025-10-01T00:00:00.000Z"
    }
  ],
  "cached": true,
  "cacheDate": "2025-10-26",
  "count": 389
}
```

**Performance:**
- Initial load: ~2.3s (912 orders ‚Üí 389 customers)
- Cached response: <100ms
- Cache duration: 24 hours

**Debug Endpoint - Cache Status**

Returns detailed information about the customer cache state.

**Response:**
```json
{
  "cacheExists": true,
  "cacheValid": true,
  "cacheTimestamp": "2025-10-26T15:50:18.000Z",
  "cacheAgeMs": 300000,
  "cacheAgeMinutes": 5,
  "cacheDurationMs": 86400000,
  "customerCount": 389
}
```

**Use this to:**
- Check if cache is working
- See when cache was last refreshed
- Determine when cache will expire
- Debug caching issues

item.name: üí∞ Pricing & Costs

query.description: Decoration method: DTG, EMB, CAP, ScreenPrint, DTF, EMB-AL, CAP-AL

request.description: Get quantity pricing tiers for a decoration method. Shows price breaks at different quantities.
Get blank garment cost by size. Returns base price before decoration.
Get comprehensive size pricing including upcharges for extended sizes (2XL, 3XL, etc).
Get highest price per size across all colors. Used for 'Starting at' pricing.

query.description: DTG, EMB, CAP, ScreenPrint, DTF, EMB-AL (Additional Logo), CAP-AL (Cap Additional Logo)

request.description: Get complete pricing package for a decoration method. Includes all tiers, rules, and costs.

item.name: Get Pricing Bundle - EMB Additional Logo

request.description:
‚úÖ DEPLOYED on Heroku (2025-09-04)

Get embroidery additional logo pricing (beyond primary logo). Returns 4 tiers:
- 1-23: $12.50
- 24-47: $11.50
- 48-71: $9.50
- 72+: $8.50

Used for quotes requiring multiple embroidery locations.

item.name: Get Pricing Bundle - CAP Additional Logo

request.description:
‚úÖ DEPLOYED on Heroku (2025-09-04)

Get cap additional logo pricing (for additional locations on caps). Returns 4 tiers:
- 1-23: $6.75
- 24-47: $5.75
- 48-71: $5.50
- 72+: $5.25

Used for future cap embroidery applications.
Get embroidery pricing based on stitch count and item type.
Get all DTG (Direct to Garment) printing costs by location and size.

üöÄ OPTIMIZED & TESTED: Get complete DTG bundle data in one request. ‚úÖ DEPLOYED on Heroku and production tested (Aug 30, 2025). Combines product details, colors, pricing tiers, DTG costs, size-based pricing, and upcharges. Reduces 4 API calls to 1. Parameters: styleNumber (required), color (optional). Performance: ~0.5-1 second response, 5-minute cache.
Get screen printing costs by number of colors and location type.
Get pricing rules and markups for style/method combination.
